info:
Description

Steven Fisher attended Stanford University and later launched the social media website Bookface. It expanded rapidly in 2003 and quickly became the most used social network on the web. Just three years later Fisher launched a new social media platform, called Chirper that experienced the same rapid success and Fisher became a self-made billionaire shortly after.

Fisher was named among the 10 most influential people in Tech in 2005, the same year his current wife Elizabeth, 'Lizze' left her job as a an attorney to launch her new career as a social media influencer through Fisher's platforms.

Recently there has been a stormy relationship between Steven and his son Henry, likely due to the pending law suit against Henry. The official statment from the family is still that Henry is set to take over after his father, though many experts say Ellen, Steven's daughter, would be a better fit.

More information

Newspaper article (LAT#223)
Company Register (BF#85)

Known relations

Elizabeth Fisher(wife)
Ellen Fisher (daughter)
Henry Fisher (son)

Description

Elizabeth Fisher was a successful attorney before changing career and launching herself as a social media influencer in 2004. Many claim she is the one that paved the way both for Bookface's success and for influencer to be viewed as a actual job.

Elizabeth met her husband, Steven Fisher, in 1986 and got married just a year later. Friends describe the couple as caring and as two best friends who are there for each other.

Known relations

Steven Fisher (husband)
Ellen Fisher (daughter)
Henry Fisher (son)

Interrogation with Elizabeth Fisher (INT#772)

Description

Henry Fisher is the youngest of the Fisher children. He dropped out of Harvard University in 2013 with the famous quote 'If Bill Gates didn't have to graduate I don't have to either'. Elizabeth 'Lizzie' Fisher was the only one of the family members who stood by Henry's choice to leave school behind.

There has been drama around Henry recently. Several women have accused Henry of uploading inappropriate photos of them without consent. The pending law suit is due for court shortly.

Known relations

Steven Fisher (dad)
Elizabeth Fisher (mother)
Ellen Fisher (sister)

Description

Ellen Fisher is the oldest child of Steven and Elizabeth Fisher. She attended Harvard University in 2006 and launched the popular chat application ChatSnap that allows the user to send messages that disappear after reading.

Ellen has graduated with a double master's degree in Economics and Technology and was mentioned as a rising star in 2011's TechWorld Magazine. In an interview from the article she mentions that 'My biggest inspiration has always been my mom Elizabeth or, as my dad always calls her, Lizzie.'

Known relations

Steven Fisher (dad)
Elizabeth Fisher (mother)
Henry Fisher (brother)

Description

Catherine Price is the head of development at Bookface. She joined the company shortly after the launch and was pivotal in the success of the company.

Mrs Price does not always see eye to eye with her manager Steven Fisher. Most recently they have been recorded arguing the collection of user data on the social platforms.

Description

Gary Brimstone is the family's butler and has served the Fishers for 11 years.

Interrogation with Gary Brimstone (INT#224)

Description

Robert is the gardener and handyman at the Fisher residence. He has worked for the Fisher's for 10 years and the majestic gardens surrounding the residence are his masterpieces.

Description

Alicia is a cook, trained in Paris. She was brought in to the Fisher residence in 2018.

Interrogation with Alicia Stone (INT#004)
